A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Its a good movie with a lame storyline.  It was written like a stand alone movie with contempt for previous films and neglect for future.  Rian Johnson took care of himself and turned the movie into a Breaking Bad episode.  Disney failed to protect the brand and the characters.  Not only did it not answer any questions meaningfully\, but it left us without any going forward.  Lame.  Hey Disney\, the dollars you see today are the result of Force Awakens.  Your dollars will diminish in the future because of this travesty.
